 I would recommend extreme caution. Ego is a path to the dark side, and di=
fficult to discern it is. If the RVG was that important, it would be illogi=
cal for them not to "make it work" for me, since I make the boxes.  I find =
linear much more consistent, easier to build, causes less noise problems, a=
nd easier to understand. 
 
 I have found "the path" usually leads to a bed=
 of quicksand.
